alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 5:48PM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Increasing north to east winds between 15 and 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph overnight. This could lead to localized blowing and drifting snow in the Flathead Valley, around Flathead Lake and on Highway 28 near Hot Springs. Wind chill as cold as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
